name: Sci-Fi Hero
description:
This asset consists of animations for a platforming character, (around 40 pixels wide and 70 pixels tall, good to use with 32 x 32 tilesets!),  wearing a big sword and a gun, who can be used as the playable character of a game or even a villain/ boss.

The file contains 2 png spritesheets plus 2 .ase editable files of the same sheets. There are 48 frames total for the character plus 5 bullet frames.

The character animation consists of:

Idle - 4 frames;

Running - 6 frames;

Change Direction - 1 frame;

Dash - 5 frames;

Damage - 2 frames;

Death - 4 frames;

Run and shoot - 6 frames;

Shooting - 3 frames;

Sword slash - 5 frames;

Air slash - 6 frames;

Air shoot - 2 frames;

Jump - 4 frames.
